ThingDef.label: Old wooden leg
ThingDef.description: Strongly dilapidated wooden leg.

ThingDef.label: Power fist
ThingDef.description: Power fist with a metal shell. Connected to small batteries that accelerate it at the time of impact. A simple and painful tool to prove to someone who's the boss.

ThingDef.label: Obsolete hand substitute
ThingDef.description: The simplest device, the purpose of which is to maintain the health of the owner. Created by primitive technologies of the industrial age.

ThingDef.label: Old simple prosthetic arm
ThingDef.description: Extremely simple device with the functions of the human hand, but extremely outdated for our era.

ThingDef.label: Non combat prosthesis
ThingDef.description: This device was made to facilitate hand work, but unfortunately it is too fragile for combat.

ThingDef.label: Active mechanical forearms
ThingDef.description: It is a mechanical prosthesis, the main advantage of which is control over the compression force and the absence of a pain threshold.

ThingDef.label: Light traction forearms
ThingDef.description: Despite the new technologies, they still have disadvantages.

ThingDef.label: magnetic hand
ThingDef.description: Magnetic joints and forearms give combat effectiveness and speed.

ThingDef.label: all-metal pirate battle claw
ThingDef.description: The lack of any tools for work is compensated by lethal force.

ThingDef.label: electromagnetic prosthesis
ThingDef.description: Electromagnetic force allows the prosthesis to maintain itself in a necessary condition.

ThingDef.label: bloodied pirate blade
ThingDef.description: Lack of difficulty in manufacturing makes it cheap, good in melee.

ThingDef.label: forearm with sensors
ThingDef.description: Low sensitivity brings both efficiency and combat unsuitability.

ThingDef.label: active hand with electric shocker
ThingDef.description: The ability to accumulate a small charge gives the prosthesis an advantage.

ThingDef.label: advanced mechanical arm
ThingDef.description: Received additional functions while improving its predecessor in exchange for excess weight.

ThingDef.label: advanced electromagnetic joints for the hand
ThingDef.description: This version of the prosthesis benefits from its design.

ThingDef.label: prosthesis with power weight
ThingDef.description: This device combines lethal force due to its severity with advanced small mathorics.

ThingDef.label: scientific hypersensitive prosthesis
ThingDef.description: Electron binding means allowed the creator to realize this device.

ThingDef.label: energy-mounted hand
ThingDef.description: The use of constant voltage allows you to lighten the weight of the structure and increase combat power.

ThingDef.label: fiber optic forearm
ThingDef.description: The use of fiber as a main component significantly reduces strength, giving priority to efficiency.

ThingDef.label: biomechanical joints
ThingDef.description: With the advent of this technology, host movements become faster.

ThingDef.label: vanometer accelerator forearm
ThingDef.description: Despite some weighting, these prostheses are able to support themselves by independently generating a charge.

ThingDef.label: active sensor hand
ThingDef.description: Increasing sensitivity, researchers were able to obtain technologies close to archotech.

ThingDef.label: bionic blades
ThingDef.description: Lightweight blades fit in place of the fingers, complicating work, but increasing damage.

ThingDef.label: titanium blades
ThingDef.description: Damage technology does not stand still, presenting you a compromise option of efficiency and power.

ThingDef.label: cyber hand mk1
ThingDef.description: Сyber prosthesis for mk1 suit, giving additional benefits.

ThingDef.label: lightweight cybernetic forearm MK1
ThingDef.description: Сyber prosthesis for mk1 suit, giving additional benefits. Now even more perfect

ThingDef.label: CyberVision VI
ThingDef.description: Cybernetic eye implant from the Galactic corporation "LifeTech". A good and cheap replacement for eyes with impaired vision. Provides the ability to see up 8192 colors. Released 25 years ago, out of production.

ThingDef.label: CyberVision VII
ThingDef.description: Cybernetic eye implant from the Galactic corporation "LifeTech". Better efficiency, perceives more colors up to 12288. Released 10 years ago.

ThingDef.label: CyberVision VII: Combat Edition
ThingDef.description: Cybernetic eye implant from the Galactic corporation "LifeTech", designed specifically for the military. Better efficiency, improves shooting accuracy, perceives more colors up to 12288. Released 10 years ago.

ThingDef.label: CyberVision VII: Medical Edition
ThingDef.description: Cybernetic eye implant from the Galactic corporation "LifeTech", designed specifically for the healthcare companies. Better efficiency, improves the quality of medical operations, perceives more colors up to 12288. Released 10 years ago.

ThingDef.label: Simple Speech Implant
ThingDef.description: Cybernetic simple speech implant from the corporation "Amazystems", designed to improve social qualities and increase the quality of social life.

ThingDef.label: Advanced Speech Implant
ThingDef.description: Cybernetic speech implant from the corporation "Amazystems", designed to improve social qualities and increase the quality of social life.

ThingDef.label: Small Research AI Assistant
ThingDef.description: Small brain implant from "Blossom Co.", designed to boost research speed.

ThingDef.label: Medium Research AI Assistant
ThingDef.description: Medium brain implant from "Blossom Co.", designed to boost research speed.

ThingDef.label: Big Research AI Assistant
ThingDef.description: Big brain implant from "Blossom Co.", designed to boost research speed.

ThingDef.label: Fixed leg prosthesis
ThingDef.description: Heavy fixed prosthesis replacing the leg.

ThingDef.label: Metal joints for legs
ThingDef.description: Lightweight prosthesis with flexion functions.

ThingDef.label: Prosthetic leg with metal plates
ThingDef.description: Plates add extra weight to the structure while increasing strength.

ThingDef.label: Prosthetic leg with simple mechanical sensors
ThingDef.description: Sensors allow the wearer to adapt to the surface.

ThingDef.label: Foot prosthesis with electronic motion sensors
ThingDef.description: Advanced sensors accelerate owner adaptation.

ThingDef.label: Shock absorbing joints
ThingDef.description: Allow you to increase the overall speed of the owner but still can not compete with natural legs.

ThingDef.label: Mobile prosthesis with initial sensitivity
ThingDef.description: The combination of technology has brought prosthetics closer to a new level.

ThingDef.label: Active hydraulic foot prosthesis
ThingDef.description: Sufficiently strong prosthesis provides high mobility.

ThingDef.label: Hydraulic foot prosthesis with sensors
ThingDef.description: Additional weight gain due to various sensors gave the prosthesis an average sensitivity.

ThingDef.label: Sports mechanical prosthesis
ThingDef.description: Professional athletes turn to this prosthesis after limb loss.

ThingDef.label: Sports prosthesis S1
ThingDef.description: Updated hip prosthesis system for greater comfort and maximum safety while walking.

ThingDef.label: Sports prosthesis S2
ThingDef.description: Advanced prosthesis S1 increased its mobility.

ThingDef.label: Knee joint
ThingDef.description: Knee joint with manual locking and hydraulic squat support for balanced and stable movements.

ThingDef.label: Foot Meridium
ThingDef.description: Foot Meridium an electronically controlled artificial foot, almost completely simulating the anatomical shape of the human foot.

ThingDef.label: MK1 cybernetic leg prosthesis
ThingDef.description: First version of cybernetic prostheses for the MK1 suit.

ThingDef.label: MK1 cybernetic advanced leg prosthesis
ThingDef.description: The second version of the cyber prosthesis from MK1.

ThingDef.label: MK1 final cybernetic leg prosthesis
ThingDef.description: Latest version of the prosthetic leg from MK1.

ThingDef.label: Simple heart pump
ThingDef.description: Temporary heart substitute.

ThingDef.label: Improved heart pump
ThingDef.description: Acceleration of rhythmic movements alleviated the negative effects of heart loss.

ThingDef.label: Prosthesis for the heart
ThingDef.description: The first prosthesis for the heart, created on a large scale.

ThingDef.label: Advanced prosthesis M2
ThingDef.description: The second prosthesis M2 combines technology from different eras, while at the same time cheap to manufacture.

ThingDef.label: Serial heart prosthesis M3
ThingDef.description: The latest version of the prosthesis increases human capabilities by several percent.

ThingDef.label: Sports pacemaker S1
ThingDef.description: It has simple metabolic acceleration systems.

ThingDef.label: Biochemistry pacemaker S2
ThingDef.description: It significantly surpasses its counterpart by accelerating life systems.

ThingDef.label: Rhythmic Cardioprosthesis MK1
ThingDef.description: The first MK1 line prosthesis designed to enhance combat quality owners.

ThingDef.label: Final pacemaker MK1
ThingDef.description: The perfect denture in the MK1 range.

ThingDef.label: Simple сatheter
ThingDef.description: A catheter that partially simulates the functioning of the kidney.

ThingDef.label: Improved kidney catheter
ThingDef.description: Advanced kidney replacement catheter.

ThingDef.label: Artificial kidney
ThingDef.description: First artificial kidney.

ThingDef.label: Synthetic kidney
ThingDef.description: First artificial kidney.

ThingDef.label: Synthetic body filtration system
ThingDef.description: Biochemical filtration system.

ThingDef.label: Synthetic filtration system MK1
ThingDef.description: The first MK1 body filtration system.

ThingDef.label: Advanced MK1 Filtration System
ThingDef.description: Better biofilter system MK1.

ThingDef.label: NanoBots: Basic Version
ThingDef.description: Nanobots are very small robots that ply inside the body, hunting down and killing viruses and infections, filtering external toxins and processing food to keep the host healthy. This version has basic functionality, but has less characteristics than advanced versions and gives immunity to only a small set of diseases.

ThingDef.label: NanoBots: Standard Version
ThingDef.description: Nanobots are very small robots that ply inside the body, hunting down and killing viruses and infections, filtering external toxins and processing food to keep the host healthy. The standard version provides reliable protection of health and gives immunity to a larger set of dangerous diseases.

ThingDef.label: NanoBots: Advanced Version
ThingDef.description: Nanobots are very small robots that ply inside the body, hunting down and killing viruses and infections, filtering external toxins and processing food to keep the host healthy. The advanced version provides reliable protection of health and gives immunity to the entire set of dangerous diseases.

ThingDef.label: Synthetic lung
ThingDef.description: Synthetic lung is a artifical organ that performs the function of a real lung, but with improved parameters.

ThingDef.label: Cybernetic lung
ThingDef.description: Cybernetic lung is a artifical organ that performs the function of a real lung, but with better parameters than a synthetic lung and has a long lifespan.

ThingDef.label: Bionic lung
ThingDef.description: Bionic lung is a artifical organ that performs the function of a real lung and is the most advanced option among similar prosthetics, as it easily adapts to the body, does not cause sepsis and has a number of improved parameters.

ThingDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Bushido"
ThingDef.description: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the influence of a mechanism, melee abilities significantly increase however the level of ownership of small arms noticeably falls.

ThingDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Sniper"
ThingDef.description: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the action of the mechanism, accuracy in ranged combat is essential rises, however, the level of melee falls markedly.

ThingDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Psychology"
ThingDef.description: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the influence of the mechanism, the ability to conduct dialogue significantly increases, which negatively affects the speed of work.

ThingDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Wild"
ThingDef.description: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the influence of the mechanism, the ability to pacify animals increases significantly, which negatively affects field work.

ThingDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "GreenFields"
ThingDef.description: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the action of the mechanism, you remember faster life cycle of plants, merging with the nature of the planet, ceasing to reverse attention to the people around you.

ThingDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Paladin"
ThingDef.description: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the influence of the mechanism, your abilities in medicine grow at an unprecedented speed, but you understand that you do not want to harm people.

ThingDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Mining Ways"
ThingDef.description: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the influence of a mechanism, your brain is filled with knowledge about the properties of rocks, and the ability to exploration is essentially are rising.

ThingDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Connoisseur Of Beauty"
ThingDef.description: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the influence of the mechanism, your worldview changes. It seems that you are beginning to see the beautiful in what you considered insignificant.

ThingDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Hephaestus"
ThingDef.description: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the action of the mechanism, fine motor skills increase, and knowledge of working with materials fills your mind.

ThingDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Science"
ThingDef.description: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the influence of the mechanism, your critical knowledge the world crowds out other thoughts, surrendering to work.

ThingDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Construction"
ThingDef.description: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the action of the mechanism, you can easily recognize errors in the drawings and create new, magnificent structures.

ThingDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Gourmet"
ThingDef.description: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the influence of the mechanism, your taste buds aggravated by commensurate newfound culinary abilities.

ThingDef.label: Singular neural network "Sacred and wild"
ThingDef.description: SA large foreign structure created from twelve fragments. Significantly changes the consciousness of people falling within the radius of impact. It has partial functionality of all parts involved in the creation mechanism.

ThingDef.label: Singular neural network "Berserker"
ThingDef.description: Combined foreign design, which, Apparently, she was able to combine the advantages two fragments of a neural network at once. Under the influence of a mechanism your athletic and fighting qualities increase significantly, which negatively affects the speed of everyday work.

ThingDef.label: Singular neural network "Meditation"
ThingDef.description: Combined foreign design, which, Apparently, she was able to combine the advantages two fragments of a neural network at once. Under the influence of a mechanism you better understand animals and people, spending free time on meditation and ordering of one’s own thoughts, which affects health.

ThingDef.label: Singular neural network "Life Force"
ThingDef.description: Combined foreign design, which, Apparently, she was able to combine the advantages two fragments of a neural network at once. Under the influence of the mechanism, you Feel how peaceful and philanthropic fills you, and knowledge of plants becomes part of consciousness.

ThingDef.label: Singular neural network "Consummation"
ThingDef.description: Combined foreign design, which, Apparently, she was able to combine the advantages two fragments of a neural network at once. Under the influence of the mechanism, you feel how the world view is changing. The desire to make peace around you ideal and comfortable for life overshadows the mind.

ThingDef.label: Singular neural network "Yin and Yang"
ThingDef.description: Combined foreign design, which, Apparently, she was able to combine the advantages two fragments of a neural network at once. Entropy and Creation harmoniously combined in the design, giving consciousness new properties.

ThingDef.label: Singular neural network "Mental focus"
ThingDef.description: Combined foreign design, which, Apparently, she was able to combine the advantages two fragments of a neural network at once. Lets focus all the efforts of the body to acquire new knowledge and improving intelligence that spends the last body energy reserves.

ThingDef.label: Light psychoactive emitter
ThingDef.description: A mechanism that affects emotional consciousness, inhibiting feelings for the sake of productivity.

ThingDef.label: Medium psychoactive emitter
ThingDef.description: A mechanism that affects emotional consciousness, inhibiting feelings for the sake of productivity.

ThingDef.label: Heavy psychoactive emitter
ThingDef.description: A mechanism that affects emotional consciousness, inhibiting feelings for the sake of productivity.

ThingDef.label: Adrenaline ribs
ThingDef.description: Many injectors located on artificial ribs produce adrenaline, accelerating the reaction.

ThingDef.label: Titanium ribs
ThingDef.description: Strong chest formed from titanium coated ribs.

ThingDef.label: Synthetic ribs
ThingDef.description: Chest consists of complex artificial ribs.

ThingDef.label: Cybernetic breast frame
ThingDef.description: Cybernetic pairs of ribs composed in the form of a strong frame.

ThingDef.label: Synthetic stomach
ThingDef.description: Advanced artificial organ composed of inorganic materials.

ThingDef.label: Cybernetic stomach MK1
ThingDef.description: MK1 advanced cybernetic prosthesis accelerating carrier metabolism.

ThingDef.label: Cybernetic stomach MK1 Light
ThingDef.description: Lightweight cybernetic prosthesis that speeds up metabolism.

ThingDef.label: Modular array of liver
ThingDef.description: Microscopic copies of robotic organisms form an organic liver.

ThingDef.label: Synthetic liver MK1
ThingDef.description: An array of artificial mechanisms that mimic the liver.

ThingDef.label: Cybernetic liver MK1
ThingDef.description: Large robotic structure imitating the functioning of the natural liver.

ThingDef.label: Cochlear receiver
ThingDef.description: Small radio transmits sound vibrations to the brain.

ThingDef.label: Sound wave generator
ThingDef.description: Advanced electromagnetic generator of sound waves transmitted to the brain.

ThingDef.label: Cybernetic ear MK1
ThingDef.description: Advanced cybernetic sound wave transducer.

ThingDef.label: Destabilized Neural Network "Unlimited Sin"
ThingDef.description: Charged and unstable alien structure, repeatedly increasing human potential. It consists of many fragments, creating an intricate pattern that shimmers in the dark.

ThingDef.label: Cybernetic exoskeleton "Adrenaline shock"
ThingDef.description: A mobile and strong spine redistributes the load and helps the wearer move.

ThingDef.label: Cybernetic exoskeleton "Colossus"
ThingDef.description: Reinforced cybernetic spine made of titanium alloy and manganese.

ThingDef.label: Cybernetic exoskeleton "Screaming Eagles"
ThingDef.description: Durable and lightweight polymetallic exoskeleton.

ThingDef.label: Cybernetic exoskeleton "Determitanion"
ThingDef.description: A cybernetic exoskeleton filled with many supporting systems. The Computerium programmed for self-healing also instills a sense of security.
